enWisdom: Ignorance is the most harmful foe
Ignorance is a curse
Ignorance of merits is one of the grossest demerits

Wisdom: إِنَّ الزُّهْدَ فِي الْجَهْلِ بِقَدْرِ الرَّغْبَةِ فِي الْعَقْلِ
enWisdom: Verily the renunciation of ignorance is proportionate to the desire for [knowledge and] intelligence
Ignorance of the adviser is [a cause of] destruction of the consulter

Wisdom: عُقْبَى الْجَهْلِ مَضَرَّةٌ وَالْحَسُودُ لَا تَدُومُ لَهُ مَسَرَّةٌ
enWisdom: The outcome of ignorance is loss; and the joy of the envious does not last

Wisdom: وَيْلٌ لِمَنْ تَمَادَى فِي جَهْلِهِ وَطُوبَى لِمَنْ‏ عَقَلَ وَاهْتَدَى
enWisdom: Woe be to the one who persists in his ignorance and blessed is the one who realizes [his mistake] and finds the right course
With ignorance, no path is purified
The correctness of an ignorant person is like the mistake of a learned person [ieit happens rarely]
The correct [action] of an ignorant person is like the slip-up of an intelligent person

Wisdom: الْجَاهِلُ صَخْرَةٌ لَا يَنْفَجِرُ مَاؤُهَا وَشَجَرَةٌ لَا يَخْضَرُّ عُودُهَا وَأَرْضٌ لَا يَظْهَرُ عُشْبُهَا
enWisdom: The ignorant person is like a rock through which water does not gush forth, and a tree, the branches of which do not become green, and a ground upon which foliage is not found
Disobey the ignorant and you will be safe
When an ignorant person grows older, his ignorance rises
The lost item of the ignorant person cannot be found
The action of an ignorant person is a curse and his knowledge is misguidance

Wisdom: مَوَدَّةُ الْجُهَّالِ مُتَغَيِّرَةُ الْأَحْوَالِ وَشِيكَةُ الِانْتِقَالِ
enWisdom: The friendship of ignorant people constantly changes [with changes in circumstances] and quickly transforms [into enmity]

Wisdom: مَوَدَّةُ الْعَوَامِ تَنْقَطِعُ كَانْقِطَاعِ السَّحَابِ وَتَنْقَشِعُ كَمَا يَنْقَشِعُ السَّرَابُ
enWisdom: The friendship of lay people parts like the parting of clouds, and disappears like the mirage disappears

Wisdom: نِعَمُ الْجُهَّالِ كَرَوْضَةٍ عَلَى مَزْبَلَةٍ [فِي مَزْبَلَةٍ]
enWisdom: The blessings of the ignorant are like a garden on a cesspit

Wisdom: لَا تُعَاتِبِ الْجَاهِلَ فَيَمْقُتَكَ وَعَاتِبِ الْعَاقِلَ يُحْبِبْكَ
enWisdom: Do not reprimand the ignorant one as he will hate you, but reprimand the wise one as he will love you [for it]

Wisdom: لَا يَرْدَعُ الْجَهُولَ إِلَّا حَدُّ الْحُسَامِ
enWisdom: Nothing restrains the foolish except the edge of a sword

Wisdom: أَبْغَضُ الْخَلَائِقِ إِلَى اللَّهِ تَعَالَى الْجَاهِلُ لِأَنَّهُ حَرَمَهُ [أَفْضَلَ‏] مَا مَنَّ بِهِ عَلَى خَلْقِهِ وَهُوَ الْعَقْلُ
enWisdom: Verily, one of the creatures most hated by Allah, the Exalted, is the man who has been left on his own [by Allah] and has strayed from the right path, moving on without a guide
The easiest thing is censuring the ignorant ones

Wisdom: إِذَا عَلَوْتَ فَلَا تُفَكِّرْ فِيمَنْ دُونَكَ مِنَ الْجُهَّالِ وَلَكِنِ اقْتَدِ بِمَنْ فَوْقَكَ مِنَ الْعُلَمَاءِ
enWisdom: When you are high, do not think of the one who is below you from the ignorant ones, rather follow [the example of] those who are above you from among the scholars
